entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers this evening. Clearing late this evening. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this evening. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Saturday 29 April 2023
